home.description: Looking for inspiration for a scene, a character, or a memorable punchline?\nDrop in a few words, a theme, an emotion \nthe tool will whisper the quote that will resonate with your readers.

suggestions.1: Write a poetic and uplifting line for someone doubting their writing talent.
suggestions.2: Generate an inspiring quote about perseverance, aimed at a writer who has lost confidence.

textarea.placeholder: Describe an emotion, a theme, an ideaâ€¦ and let the magic happen
